item.title: Climate and Weather
item.description: 62 years of annual anomalies of precipitation (%) in peninsular Spain in a single graphic. Data: SPREAD. Summer anomaly of temperature and precipitation in Barcelona 1914-2018. Data: ECA&D. Summer anomaly of temperature and precipitation in Madrid 1920-2018. Data: ECA&D. Summer anomaly of temperature and precipitation in Santiago de Compostela 1950-2018. Data: ECA&D. Monthly precipitation anomaly registered in Santiago de Compostela in 2017.
